long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blocks YouTube so that you can focus and not waste time. ⌛

If you are like me and waste a lot of time on YouTube daily, this extension will BLOCK you from opening and using YouTube, saving you a few hours of your time daily. 

⚠️ IMPORTANT ⚠️
In order for the extension to work, you will have to give it access in the "Extensions" section of the browser
